title: Balance Holistic Health Center - Brecksville, OH
description: Specialties: We are a holistic health center specializing in functional medicine, IV therapy, aesthetics, stretch therapy, NAD+ therapy, red light therapy, PEMF therapy, cupping, and nutrition.
